attributes.action: To implement a national anti-litter campaign.
attributes.additional_details: I am asking to Government to implement and publicise a nationwide anti-litter campaign to educate the pubic on the dangers of littering and penalties for doing so.
attributes.background: We live within a culture where littering has become the norm for many.  The Coronavirus pandemic has highlighted this problem as our parks and beaches have become utterly trashed with litter during lockdown restrictions.

rejection.details:
Increase penalties, enforcement and education to tackle littering & fly tipping:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324488
